item.title: Crazy Pip Stop
item.description: Crazy Pip Stop is a mobile app for the Crazy Pip Stop board game. This mobile application is cross-platform and can be found on any version of iOS and Android devices. The application is used as a support resource for the board game and its main objective is to offer different game modes which each of them share a countdown with music. In addition, each game mode has its own victory and loss points counter according to the game rules.
